title: Trump faces major hurdles — and his own words — in challenging rulings against his new travel ban
text: Moments later, Trump said he didn't like the new order as much as the first because it was a "watered-down" version that he only agreed to on the advice of lawyers. "We ought to go back to the first one and go all the way," he said.
summary:
Moments later, Trump said he didn't like the new order as much as the first because it was a "watered-down" version that he only agreed to on the advice of lawyers.
"We ought to go back to the first one and go all the way," he said.
